name: Fearless Freddy
description:
Fearless Freddy is at it again in his latest adventure he travels across the globe in search of treasures hidden for millennia.

Download this ROM and play it on any Game Boy Emulator or on original hardware using a flash cart.

When I discovered GB Studio I was instantly taken with the possibilities. This is my first  project made using the software and it is a short action puzzle game/demo.  My aim with this project was to hark back to the challenging computer games that I played as a child. Games that took trial and error and some time to navigate.  I hope you spend a little time with this game and enjoy playing it.

Please note that there is no sound or music (I have yet to learn how to create and add this).
